channel.title: HoloLens and the method of Loci
channel.description:
This (https://iform.us/ssite/loci-hololens-app/) came up when I was doing research on augmented reality tools for knowledge management. I'm curious to know if other people have been thinking about AR / VR and its relation to knowledge management and engineering.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_PvATogqGKk&feature=emb_title
